title: Wowcher is selling a mini beauty blender washing machine
text:

The humble beauty blender has become an essential makeup tool for applying foundation and many of us can't imagine life without it.

It's no wonder, then, that beauty junkies have been going wild for a mini makeup blender washing machine that you can now buy from deals website Wowcher for £4.99.

A hit on social media, the beauty blender cleaner is designed to quickly and easily remove excess make up and grime from the plush foam applicators or makeup brushes, using just water and liquid soap.

It is powered by batteries and is available in either a black or pink design.

The deals website has slashed 75 per cent off the machine's original price of £19.99 , which means you save £15.

So how does it work?

Firstly, you need to fill the makeup blender washing machine with warm water and a squirt or two of liquid soap, such as face wash or washing-up liquid.

You can then dunk your beauty blender into the water and start the machine.

The washing machine will begin to spin, helping to remove any makeup or dirt from your foam sponge applicator.

Once you've rinsed it with clean water in the machine, your beauty blender should be good as new and ready to use again.

The beauty blender washing machine went viral back in May 2019, when beauty blogger Tiffany Lynette Davis shared it with her thousands of followers on Instagram .

It's a great tool for anyone who wears make up everyday or a brilliant Christmas gift for avid beauty fans.
